data.name: Slotracers VR
data.detailed_description:
Slotracers VR is a full slotracing experience built for VR


Bring back your childhood memories - build the best slotracing tracks you can imagine and race on them. Equipped with a powerful ingame editor, offering lots of track and scenery parts, the only limit is your imagination. Use the integrated Steam Workshop to share your creations with the community. Race against the clock or compete against your friends on self built or downloaded tracks.

Multiplayer

Enjoy every aspect of the game with up to 8 players - build the ultimate racetrack with your friends or compete against them in exciting races.

AI

Play against AI - both in singleplayer or multiplayer. The AI adheres to the same rules as the player, causing the AI to feel lifelike. They switch tracks to overtake slower cars in front and also try to avoid collisions. But just like a real player, they might not always succeed!

Steam Workshop

The integrated Steam Workshop support allows you to share and download racetracks from right inside the game.





  • Build racetracks with the integrated editor, available in single- and multiplayer
  • Singleplayer campaign with a total of 27 tracks
  • Perform races on self-built or downloaded racetracks
  • Various pieces of track available
  • Improve the look of your racetracks with different vegetation and scenery parts
  • Share your racetracks with the community via the Steam Workshop
  • Online multiplayer
  • AI drivers
  • 10 cars with different characteristics and looks
  • Multiple paint jobs per car
  • Night races
  • Two types of movement - Teleport and Continuous

data.short_description: Slotracers VR is a full slotracing experience built for VR. Race miniature cars against your friends on race tracks created by yourself, your friends or the community. Build your own tracks together with your friends and share them on the Steam Workshop for other people to enjoy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k or equivalent AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent AMD card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection recommended for online multiplayer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600k or equivalent AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or equivalent AMD card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection recommended for online multiplayer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k or equivalent AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent AMD card
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu 19.04. Other Linux distributions and Ubuntu versions may work.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600k or equivalent AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or equivalent AMD card
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Tested on Ubuntu 19.04. Other Linux distributions and Ubuntu versions may work.
